result.reason: Feature request to hide connection tabs to maximize screen space, feasible by modifying the custom DockPanel suite implementation.
result.approach: Add 'HideTabs' boolean to Settings and a toggle in View menu. Modify DockPaneStripNG to respect this setting, effectively hiding the tab strip by setting its height to 0 or preventing drawing when enabled.
